translation.App.name: Design System Configurator
translation.App.description: In three simple steps, the configurator will guide you through the customization of your new design system.
translation.Theme.Foundations.title: Foundations
translation.Theme.Foundations.description: Define the colors, fonts, and shadows of your new design system.
translation.Theme.Foundations.Colors.title: Colors
translation.Theme.Foundations.Colors.description: Use our editor to create beautiful and functional palettes.
translation.Theme.Foundations.Typography.title: Typography
translation.Theme.Foundations.Typography.description: Set the typograpic scale by choosing a Google font or a custom one.
translation.Theme.Foundations.Elevations.title: Elevations
translation.Theme.Foundations.Elevations.description: Define the properties of the shadows cast by Bento DS elevations.
translation.Theme.Foundations.Tokens.title: Tokens
translation.Theme.Foundations.Tokens.description: Assign the colors from your palettes to the theme tokens.
translation.Theme.Configuration.title: Configuration
translation.Theme.Configuration.description: Set the padding, spacing, and border radius of your components and patterns.
translation.Theme.Configuration.General.title: General
translation.Theme.Configuration.General.description: Define common appearance rules for your components.
translation.Theme.Configuration.Components.title: Components
translation.Theme.Configuration.Components.descripti: Choose the design of your components as padding, spacing, or border radius.
translation.Theme.Configuration.Patterns.title: Patterns
translation.Theme.Configuration.Patterns.description: Design the appearance of complex components and templates.
translation.Theme.Export.title: Export
translation.Theme.Export.description: Now that all the settings are done, you are ready to set up the Figma and React libraries.
translation.Theme.Export.Figma.title: Figma library
translation.Theme.Export.Figma.description: Use the button below to copy the configuration JSON and paste it into the Figma plugin Bento DS Configurator.
translation.Theme.Export.React.title: React library
translation.Theme.Export.React.description: Download the configuration file and use it to replace the default one inside the React library.
translation.ColorsSection.title: Colors
translation.ColorPresets.description: Select one of the presets to populate the palettes below.
translation.Tokens.title: Tokens
translation.Tokens.Color.label: Color
